name: NotyStack Android
desc: Fully fledged android CRUD app based on different design patterns. Built using Java, XML, SQLite, Firebase, RoomDB, MVVM.

name: Disney Pixar Dashboard
desc: Built an interactive Power BI dashboard analyzing Disney and Pixar movie metrics.

desc: Developed an AI agent that plays the 2048 game using heuristic search strategies.

name: Hand Gesture Deep Learning
desc: Trained a CNN model to recognize hand gestures for real-time interaction using webcam input.

name: LinkedIn Data Analysis
desc: Performed user behavior and connection pattern analysis using LinkedIn data scraping.

name: Medical Chatbot Generative AI
desc: Created a generative AI chatbot to provide medical info using LLMs and context-aware retrieval.
